Appleton.Appleton Technical Academy: Appleton Technical Academy, more commonly known as A-Tech, is a public charter school with a focus on developing the skills necessary for successful entry into the modern advanced manufacturing workforce. The school was created as a result of the growing number of manufacturing jobs that need to be filled in Wisconsin, as baby boomers retire. The school was formally established at the end of 2013 and the first day of classes was on September 2, 2014 (2014-09-02Tmdy).
